text: (Napiye!) Umakku munnar nam anuppi vaitta ovvoru tutarum, napiyum, (otavo, nanmaiyaiyo) natumpotu, avarkalutaiya anta nattattil saittan kulappattai eriyatiruntatillai eninum saittan erinta kulappattai allah nikkiyap pinnar avan tannutaiya vacanankalai urutippatuttukiran melum, allah yavarraiyum arintavanakavum, nanam mikkonakavum irukkinran
